text:
Hey there  <@U06F0VD6S2G>  the HubL require_js is built in to HubSpot and solves this problem for you. You do not need to use the requirejs you're linking to at all.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#require-js|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#require-js>

We also have require_css for css files <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#require-css|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#require-css>
